example.name: autogen1
example.text: Nippon Kangyo 's moves puzzled traders and created confusion among potential investors , many of whom decided to stay out of the market .
example.arg: among potential investors , many of whom decided to stay out of the market

example.text: Confusion about the two banks ' hurried efforts to round up financing for a new bid that the UAL board has n't even seen yet
